nodes.text: Blue honeycup was a type of tea that was served at Café Raduli in the city of Canto Bight on the planet Cantonica. It was potable by Caskadags. The Caskadag assassin Anglang Lehet considered drinking it to be one of his few indulgences. In 34 ABY, he drank a cup at Café Raduli, enjoying the tea's piquant sweetness. Lehet later set the tea down when he left the café to follow the Wermal VaporTech salesbeing Kedpin Shoklop.
Blue honeycup first appeared in "Rules of the Game," a short story written by Saladin Ahmed for the 2017 novella collection Canto Bight.
